data.text: @skylit4 @bitcoin_halving None of the photos made it faker than it already is. Lying is getting so easy.
@bitcoin_halving U guys must know that the temperature in shenzhen yeaterday was 16-26 Celsius degree
@bitcoin_halving Brainwashed by Western fake news! Shenzhen people have never even seen snow, look at the map and learn geography!
@bitcoin_halving Shenzhen is almost a tropical city close to hongkong. No snow for all season you fucking moron!
@bitcoin_halving I guess you never visited Shenzhen before, as Shenzhen is a city that lacks snow most of years, and the daily temperature in Shenzhen now is about 20 degrees.
@bitcoin_halving Anyone with a brain knows that it doesn't snow in Shenzhen
@bitcoin_halving 打开链接看了，文字看上去似乎基本客观，三张配图下方也有文字注明分别是哈尔滨和武汉民众排队测核酸，与文章所说深圳不是同一地区，容易误导。而且，既然记者能够接触到上沙村民众，要取得一些照片应该不难，很难理解记者为什么要用不想干地区的照片来配图，这样会导致整个文章的不可信了!
@bitcoin_halving ahhhhhh. We are not short of food, we are short of snow. Please learn more geography knowledge before hacking China.😂😂😂
